## ColorEncoding interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ColorEncoding extends Encoding 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Encoding](./types.encoding.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [scaleName?](./types.colorencoding.scalename.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Named thematic scale to use for the color nominal, sequential, diverging, etc. |
|  [thematicSchemePath?](./types.colorencoding.thematicschemepath.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Path of the color on theme.scheme. Includes support for indexed palettes, e.g., 'nominal\[1\]'. This is very rudimentary, but allows us to recompute the color if the theme changes. |
|  [uniques?](./types.colorencoding.uniques.md) |  | string\[\] \| number\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> For nominal scales, this is the list of unique values. |
|  [value?](./types.colorencoding.value.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Fixed color CSS value |
